Introduction

I am a passionate software development student enrolled with Correlation One currently honing my advanced HTML skills. I've built this website to showcase what I've learned so far. I strive for excellence and hope to aid others in building an attractive website for their personal or business needs. I've set up this form asking my visitors to contact me so I can help them design their very own website and will aim to make this a reality in the near future.

I am excited to enter the tech industry and am grateful for the opportunity that Amazon has provided me via Career Choices. I've been a fulfillment warehouse associate for over 8 years now. I first started with DHL Logistics, then I worked for TJ Maxx Distribution Center. Given my experience in logistics, I applied to Amazon and have stuck around for 5 years so far. During this time I got to know myself better and decided to learn software development to eventually make this my career and further myself financially. You can learn more about me here. I will illustrate some of the websites I've built so far.
